SEARCH
Package Service

Class PatientService

Object
UserService<Patient,PatientRepository>
PatientService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IService<Patient,PatientRepository>
public class PatientService extends UserService<Patient,PatientRepository>
Service class for patient-specific operations. Extends UserService to provide functionalities such as managing appointments, retrieving doctors and schedules, and accessing medical records.

    • addNewAppointment

      public void addNewAppointment(String doctorId, LocalDate date, Timeslot timeslot) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a new appointment for the patient with the specified doctor, date, and timeslot.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor.
      date - the date of the appointment.
      timeslot - the timeslot of the appointment.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the doctor or patient is not found, or if the timeslot is already booked.

    • removeAppointment

      public void removeAppointment(String appointmentId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the appointment is not found.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentId, DateTimeslot dateTimeslot)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new date and timeslot.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      dateTimeslot - the new date and timeslot for the appointment.
